title: The King's Storyteller
description: The Queen has died, so her son becomes the new King. But who will tell the King stories at bedtime now that the Queen has gone? In this moving story from Scotland retold by storyteller Amy Douglas, we hear about the King's quest to find a new storyteller - with an upbeat twist at the end of the tale.
itunes:title: The King's Storyteller
itunes:author: Wardour Studios
